item.description:
Now is the time to meet and create new business with people you know and trust!

We are a local group of dedicated, proficient and pro-active small business owners who are looking to network with other local owners in the effort to build our businesses through referrals, as well as learn more about how to overcome the unique challenges that face smaller entities.



North Shore Business Support Network Newsletter
Would you like to tell us about your business?



Please join us at our monthly networking meeting the second Monday of every month, at 8:00 am to 10:00am but you do not have to stay this long.

group.name: The NorthShore Business Support Network meetup

item.name: The NorthShore Business Support Network Meetup!
